Package com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BleAdvertiseParser
    Extract the data form an advertise used by a device that follow the BlueST protocol.
    BLENodeDefines
    This class help to get list of services and characteristics available in the BlueST devices
    BLENodeDefines.FeatureCharacteristics
    This class define the characteristics associated with the features
    BLENodeDefines.Services
    This class help to get list of services available in the BlueST devices
    BLENodeDefines.Services.Config
    Service that permit to configure the board parameters or the features
    BLENodeDefines.Services.Debug
    Service for access to the board stdout/err
    LogFeatureActivity
    Helper class for an activity that have to log the feature data, this code manage the permission required for store file on the disk and send the collected data by mail the activity will instantiate a menu item for start/stop the log activity
    NodeScanActivity
    Extend this activity if you need to start a device scan using the Manager.
    NumberConversion
    This class help to convert bytes array to different formats values types and values types to byte array
    NumberConversion.BigEndian
    This class implements the conversion for bytes array to different formats values types and from values types to byte array for Big endian base order
    NumberConversion.LittleEndian
    This class implements the conversion for bytes array to different formats values types and from values types to byte array for little endian base order
    SearchSpecificNode
    This is a simple class that can be extended for search a node with a particular tag.
    UnwrapTimestamp
    Class that help to unwrap the timestamp
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BtAdapterNotFound
    Exception throw when the bt service is not running and the user have to enable it
    InvalidBleAdvertiseFormat
    Exception throw when a ble device has a wrong advertise format
    InvalidFeatureBitMaskException
    Exception throw when we found a bitmask with more than 1 bit set to 1
